lyrics.text:
(Intro - Orchestral swells, building tension, subtle rhythmic pulse)

(Verse 1 - SpeedCore beat kicks in, aggressive orchestral stabs, vocals enter)
(Whispers, building intensity)
Fractured light, a blinding gleam,
A waking nightmare, a fevered dream.
From silent void, a primal call,
Fizz La Metta, consuming all!
Velocity's child, a storm unbound,
Shattering silence, shaking the ground!
A symphony of chaos, sharp and fast,
This fleeting moment, built to last!

(Chorus 1 - Full orchestral power, intense SpeedCore, anthemic vocals)
FIZZ LA METTA!
Feel the rush, the sonic blast!
FIZZ LA METTA!
Grandeur shattered, fading fast!
Orchestral fury, digital scream,
Caught in the torrent, a violent stream!
No turning back, no place to hide,
Engulfed by the tide!

(Breakdown 1 - Abrupt cut, sparse orchestral chords, rebuilding energy)
(Voice, distorted, echoing)
Echoes... of glory...
Fading... decaying...
(Rhythmic pulse rebuilds)

(Verse 2 - Similar energy, more dissonant elements, vocals convey struggle)
Beneath the roar, a hollow sound,
Where broken empires lie profound.
The price of speed, the cost of might,
Consumed by endless, burning light.
A phantom touch, a phantom name,
Igniting ruin, feeding the flame!
Each beat a fracture, a desperate plea,
Lost in the velocity!

(Chorus 2 - Even more intense, pushed to limits)
FIZZ LA METTA!
Feel the rush, the sonic blast!
FIZZ LA METTA!
Grandeur shattered, fading fast!
Orchestral fury, digital scream,
Caught in the torrent, a violent stream!
No turning back, no place to hide,
Engulfed by the tide!

(Bridge - Shift in texture, distorted orchestral solo/spoken word, building tension)
(Spoken, heavily processed, over heavy, syncopated beat and building orchestral chaos)
They chase the zenith, the ultimate high...
But the fall is infinite, beneath the sky...
This energy... it burns... it breaks... it defines...
Forever bound... by these fractured designs...
(Orchestral build intensifies, drums accelerate)

(Outro - Massive crescendo, collide, or chaotic fade-out)
(Full ensemble, extreme distortion, chaotic effects)

(Option 1: Abrupt End)

FIZZ!

(Option 2: Chaotic Fade)

(Lingering distorted orchestral motifs and decaying SpeedCore beats fade into silence)

sound_prompts.text: Epic orchestral introduction with sweeping strings and dramatic brass swells, building tension.
Relentless SpeedCore drum beat with heavily distorted double kick drums and fast snare rolls.
Aggressive orchestral stabs and fast, dissonant string ostinatos punctuating the rhythm.
Distorted, aggressive lead synth playing fast, atonal melodies.
Powerful brass fanfares and sweeping string themes during choruses.
Peak intensity chorus with all elements at maximum: powerful orchestral layers, relentless SpeedCore drums/synths.
Sudden silence or sparse, reverberant orchestral chords after the first chorus.
Filtered drums and synth arpeggios rebuilding energy after the breakdown.
Dissonant orchestral textures and glitchy synth elements in the second verse.
Extremely intense second chorus with all elements pushed to limits, potential for vocal screams.
Bridge: Distorted orchestral solo or processed spoken word over heavy, syncopated beat. Massive orchestral build-up with accelerating drum patterns.
Outro: Final massive crescendo, colliding orchestral and SpeedCore elements, extreme distortion, chaotic effects. Ends abruptly or with a chaotic fade.
Use of heavy distortion and saturation on drums and synths.
Atmospheric pads and dark textures for underlying tension.
Heavy compression on drums and bass for maximum impact.
Chaotic delay and reverb effects to create disorientation.
